song_lyrics: Hā re Harikrishṇa haiyāno māre hār chhe jī ho,
Joīne jīvu chhu sundar mūrti re...
Hā re mārā neṇā taṇo shaṇgār chhe jī ho,
Aḷago na melu have urthī re.
Hā re māru chittḍu chorāṇu enī chālmā,
Hā re hu to vash thaī chhu enā vhālmā jī ho. 1
Hā re mārā urmā khūntyo chhe chheḍo pāghno,
Hā re kaī pār nahi mārā bhāgyno jī ho. 2
Hā re hu to dāsī chhu Krupānidhānnī,
Hā re mane chāvīne āpī chhe bīḍī pānnī jī ho. 3
Hā re dayā hetno bharyo chhe Albelḍo,
Hā re Premānandno vahālo rang chhelḍo jī ho. 4
title: Hā re Harikrishṇa haiyāno māre hār chhe jī ho

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-9013: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
